Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing with my friends on the back porch of my home and we saw a bright blue light in the sky behaving strangely. It bounced around, mainly up and down, almost crossing paths with a commercial airplane at one point. this went on for over 20 minutes, we attempted to take photos with our phones and eventually got the video camera and got footage of it's actions. It's behavior was certainly not that of any aircraft we have seen before and it dimmed and brightened throughout the event. we eventually went inside after not being able to identify it.
